name: Red Planet Pinball - Mars Expedition Free
name_original: Red Planet Pinball - Mars Expedition Free
description:
Your journey to the Red Planet awaits, in this intergalactic pinball adventure.

- Listed by Apple in "Best 10 iPad Apps in 2010"
- Apple Design Awards 2010 winner
- 1st place in US top paid apps during the first sales day

"The experience of holding a pinball table in your hand is great, and with [the] amazing tables included, you'll have hours of entertainment lined up."
-- Tim Rattray, SlideToPlay.com

"With [the] tables, reliable physics and controls, and gorgeous graphics, it is a pleasure to recommend."
-- Levi Buchanan, IGN.com
